ygData.subject: Petition questions (Was: On the topic of...)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... how/where to get them, or even what they are, but we don t want to waste our time ... The last I heard on this, GZ said they were waiting on some things
ygData.messageBody:
>1) Several of our songs (levels 39, 45, 47, 49) don't seem to be in the
>game. We would like to know when we can expect these to be implemented.
>If they are indeed in the game already (perhaps discovered via quests)
>please at least let us know that they exist. We don't need to know
how/where >to get them, or even what they are, but we don't want to waste
our time
>questing for something that isn't there.


The last I heard on this, GZ said they were waiting on "some things to be
implemented" before they could add those songs.

Also, you mihgt ask why missed notes occur so often with even the lowest lvl
songs. I'm 26th, play Hymn and Selo's on a nearly constant basis, and STILL
miss notes quite often. If you play a song that much, you should not even
miss notes in your sleep. Also, is it just bards, or do blue con's resist
the hell out of the caster's spells too? (Got 5, that's right "FIVE"
resisits on DDD in a row from the hermit in SK the other night :o/ )

-=B=-
